designSystemProfile.name: Daylight-Inspired-HeliosX
designSystemProfile.purpose: Provide a consistent visual + structural style reference so an AI (e.g. in Cursor) can generate pages similar in feel to daylightcomputer.com without copying its assets or text.

voiceGuidelines.sentenceStyle: Short to medium sentences, clear, non-technical unless needed.
voiceGuidelines.attitude: Principled and idealistic without being dramatic; focused on solving a real problem.

layoutSystem.maxWidth: 1200-1280px main content width centered on large screens

grid.sectionsUse: Hero uses 2-column layout; feature sections use 2-3 columns; content is vertically stacked, clearly separated.

visualPattern: Hero: strong statement + key CTAs + supporting product image
Mission/manifesto: short block of purpose-driven copy
Feature highlights: icons or small visuals + short headings + 1-3 line descriptions in grid layout
Use-cases or scenarios: repeated card pattern
Deep dive links: small navigation row to product/specs/FAQ/support
Ethos/mission: block of text explaining values and structure
Footer: compact nav + legal + brand line

navigation.style: Simple top nav with minimal links and one primary CTA button.

left: Secondary CTA (e.g. Learn more / See how it works)
Micro trust indicators (stock/ship info, benefit bullets)
right: Single clean product visual or mockup

hero.feeling: Immediate clarity: what the product is, why it matters, how to get it.

colorSystem.overallMood: Minimal, high contrast, with one strong accent color. Backgrounds often light/neutral or soft gradient; plenty of white/negative space.

usageGuidelines.accentUsage: Use accent color for primary CTAs and key highlights; keep palette restrained.
usageGuidelines.backgroundUsage: Alternate soft sections to visually separate themes.
usageGuidelines.avoid: Loud multi-color gradients or more than three core brand colors.

typographySystem.typeMood: Clean, modern, neutral sans-serif; feels editorial, not corporate.

fonts.primary: Inter, SF Pro, Satoshi, or similar geometric sans-serif

styles.headlines: Tight leading, strong but not ultra bold, sentence-case.
styles.emphasis: Color and weight shifts only, no underlines.

cards.usage: Feature explanations, use cases, FAQs, spec highlights.

featureGrid.pattern: 3 or 4 columns on desktop, stacked on mobile

testimonialBlock.layout: Quotes in minimal cards with small name/role

imageryStyle.note: Never copy original site's images—replicate the calm, premium atmosphere only.

icons.style: Simple line or minimal filled icons, consistent stroke width

animationStyle.hover: Micro transitions (scale 1.02, soft shadow, color shift)

iaPrinciples.clarity: Each section answers one user question

generationGuidelines: Prioritize clarity: one main product, one CTA above the fold.
Large typography, generous spacing, restrained palette.
Use repeating grid patterns for consistency.
Include a mission or values section tied to affordability and ethics.
Include subtle trust indicators like testimonials or hospital usage.
